definitions.definition: a person who hoards wealth and spends as little money as possible.
examples: penny-pincher, Scrooge, pinchpenny; Moreinformalskinflint, money-grubber, cheapskate, tightwad, piker "one wonders how happy a miser could ever be"Moreskinflint, money-grubber, cheapskate, tightwad, piker one wonders how happy a miser could ever be
